author: cms-sw
body: do not pass `--copt=-mcpu=native --copt=-mtune=native` to TF build if CMS `arch_build_flags` is not set. For `x86_64` though we set `--copt=-march=x86-64-v2` but as  `arch_build_flags` is not set for `x86_64` so we also end up passing  `--copt=-mcpu=native --copt=-mtune=native` . This can cause compiler to optimize tf build for the machine where it was build
title: [TF] Do not use mcpu/mtune native if CMS arch_build_flags are not set
